high_descs: Turn around and take one step, then turn left and walk to the couch.
Pick up the orange pillow that is near the newspaper on the couch.
Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right.
Put the orange pillow down on the chair.
Turn to the right and face the black couch with the newspaper and pillow on it.
Pick the pillow up from the couch.
Turn around and cross the room and turn to the right to face the black chair with a credit card on it.
Put the pillow on the chair.
anns.task_desc: Put a pillow on a chair.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go to the couch across from you.
Pick up the orange pillow on the right end of the couch.
Turn around and walk across the living room to the arm chair on your right.
Place the pillow on the seat of the arm chair.
anns.task_desc: Put a pillow on one of the chairs.
